original: ma h'a sh'i ta wa t'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ma h'a sh'i ta wa t'i s'a dha nam /

original: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement of the Great Cool Grove

original: 'phags ma @218b bsil ba'i tshal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma @218b bsil ba'i tshal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Great Cool Grove

original: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo zhal gcig pa /
analyzed: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo zhal gcig pa /
translated: The Great Cool Grove has one face,

original: sku mdog dmar mo phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya /
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya /
translated: and a red body. With her two right hands she holds a rosary and makes the boon-granting gesture.

original: g-yon pa gnyis kyis rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / thugs kar po ting bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon pa gnyis kyis rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / thugs kar po ting bsnams pa /
translated: With her two left hands she holds a vajra hook and a book at her heart.

original: dzam yig gi sa bon las 'khrungs shing 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: dzam yig gi sa bon las 'khrungs shing 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa /
translated: She is born from the seed syllable jra and is crowned with Amitabha.

original: skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs shing sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs shing sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: She sits in half-lotus posture and is adorned with various ornaments.

original: nyi ma'i gdan la 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i gdan la 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She is on a sun seat and is radiant.

original: 'phags ma bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The Means of Achievement of the Noble Cool Grove is complete.
